      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030403</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La malaria</string>
            <string language="en">Malaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Malaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Malaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Malária</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Malaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελονοσία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno debe encontrar información sobre el paludismo. Para ello tiene que buscar información sobre el protozoos que la produce, el vector que la transmite y el tratamiento de la enfermedad.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must find information about malaria. For this they will have to look for information on the protozoa which causes it, the vector which transmits it and the treatment of the disease.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">malaria</string>
            <string language="en">malaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer 
Informationen über Malaria finden muß. Nach diesem müssen sie
nach Informationen über die Protozoen suchen, die Ursachen es, der 
Vektor, der es überträgt und die Behandlung der Krankheit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit trouver 
des informations sur la malaria. Pour ceci ils devront 
rechercher l'information sur les protozoaires qui des causes lui, le 
vecteur qui le transmet et le traitement de la maladie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante deve encontrar a 
informação sobre a malária. Para esta terão que procurar a 
informação nos protozoa que causas ele, o vetor que o transmite e o 
tratamento da doença.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve trovare le 
informazioni su malaria. Per questa dovranno cercare le 
informazioni sui protozoi che cause esso, il vettore che lo trasmette 
ed il trattamento della malattia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να βρεί τις 
πληροφορίες για την ελονοσία. Για αυτό θα πρέπει να ψάξουν 
τις πληροφορίες για τις πρωτόζωες που το προκαλούν, το διάνυσμα 
που διαβιβάζει το και τη θεραπεία της ασθένειας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Malaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">malaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">malária</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
